title: _D3DKMDT_VIDPN_PRESENT_PATH_CONTENT (d3dkmdt.h)
description: The D3DKMDT_VIDPN_PRESENT_PATH_CONTENT enumeration is used to indicate the type of content that is displayed on a VidPN present path.
